Uses of Package
br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.interfaces

Packages that use br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.interfaces

br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.stubs   
 

Classes in br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.interfaces used by br.uff.tempo.middleware.management
IActuator
          This interface contains Actuator methods

Actuator is an element that execute actions corresponding to context rules
IAggregator
          This interface contains Aggregator methods

Aggregator contains aggregation methods that add Context Variables to Interpreters of context rules
IInterpreter
          This interface contains Interpreter methods

Interpreter contains methods that set and execute context rules
IPerson
          This interface contains Person Agent methods

Person agent type contains methods that manage mobility and aggregate body sensors
IPlace
          This interface contains Place Agent methods

This element contains methods that indicates access by agents in Place
IResourceAgent
          This interface contains ResourceAgent Agent methods

ResourceAgent represents smart modules that comprehends communications and contextual functionalities
IResourceAgent.ContextVariable
           
IResourceAgent.Service
           
IResourceDiscovery
          Resource Discovery Service (RDS) interface

It enables use of RDS in SmartServer
IResourceLocation
          Resource Location Service (RLS) interface

It enables use of RLS in SmartServer
IResourceRegister
          Resource Register Service (RRS) interface

It enables use of RRS in SmartServer
IRuleInterpreter
          Rule interpreter interface

Rule Interpreter manages context rules
